com.iciql.adapter

Class XStreamTypeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iciql.adapter.XStreamTypeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iciql.DataTypeAdapter<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlObjectAdapter

    public class XStreamTypeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Iciql.DataTypeAdapter<java.lang.Object>
    Base class for inserting/retrieving a Java Object (de)serialized as XML using XStream.
